Receipt of Amir's letter and arrival of Afghan delegates obviate necessity of action contemplated in your telegram 1066 S., dated ave you considered what is to be clone if, despite negotiations, Afghans continue to flout ' armistice terms by raiding across our border? There seems little indication at present of cessation of these raids, -and recent telegrams show that raiding parties include Afghan regulars as well as tribesmen; see, for example, your Army Department telegram No. 977.1 dated .20th July. 1 shall be glad of a very early reply as these violations of armistice terms are attracting attention here.
